UniprotID	Q9H244
Accession	Q9H244;D3DNJ5;Q546J7
EntryName	P2Y12_HUMAN
ProteinName	P2Y purinoceptor 12 (P2Y12) (ADP-glucose receptor) (ADPG-R) (P2T(AC)) (P2Y(AC)) (P2Y(cyc)) (P2Y12 platelet ADP receptor) (P2Y(ADP)) (SP1999)
GeneName	P2RY12 HORK3
Length	342
Function	Receptor for ADP and ATP coupled to G-proteins that inhibit the adenylyl cyclase second messenger system. Not activated by UDP and UTP. Required for normal platelet aggregation and blood coagulation.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
